explains: vt. 使失事；使毁灭；使失败

sentences.en: I went to the boat that was blown onto the beach in the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 我走到那艘被吹到海滩上的遇难船那里。

sentences.en: The only survivor of a shipwreck was washed up on a small, uninhabited island.
sentences.cn: 海难中唯一的幸存者被冲到一个无人居住的小岛上。

sentences.en: He was drowned in a shipwreck off the coast of Spain.
sentences.cn: 他在西班牙海岸的一次船只失事中淹死。
